headline.main: Leaders Unapologetic on Mexico Rights Report

lead_paragraph: Two Mexican presidents who held power during the so-called dirty war against leftist groups in the 1970's defended their anti-insurgency campaigns today, saying they were unaware of any human rights abuses. The government's human rights ombudsman released a report this week on human rights abuses during the 1970's and President Vicente Fox said he would name a special prosecutor to put on trial those who led the torture and murder.
abstract: Jose Lopez Portillo and Luis Echeverria, M
